text: atarkavarkal (titukkittu) ‘‘meyyakave nir yusuhpaka iruppiro?'' Enru kettarkal. Atarkavar ‘‘nantan yusuhp! Ivar en cakotarar. Niccayamaka allah enkal mitu perarul purintirukkiran. Enenral, niccayamaka evar irai accamutaiyavaraka iruntu, ciramankalaiyum cakittuk kolkiraro (attakaiya) nanmai ceytavarkalin kuliyai niccayamaka allah vinakki vituvatillai'' enru kurinar
